name: @danielhaim/analyzeredirects
description: A tool to analyze and resolve conflicting URL redirects.

scripts.release: npm version patch && git add -A && git commit -m 'Release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm version major && git add -A && git commit -m 'Major Release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git add -A && git commit -m 'Minor Release: v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")' && git push && npm publish
